name: Pomegranate Lemon Mint Refresher
description: Refreshingly Cold Lemonade with pink pomegranate and mint
directions: Pour ice cubes into a large glass pitcher.
Slice the pomegranate in half, then squeeze the juice from both halves over the ice cubes in the pitcher.  It is okay if a few of the arils end up in the pitcher because they are edible.
Slice the lemon in half and squeeze the lemon juice into the pitcher.
Pour the sparkling water into the pitcher.
Put the nicest leaves into the pitcher.
Pour into a tall glass and enjoy!
